tuv.seg: National Physical and Sensory Disability Database
An Bunachar Sonraí Náisiúnta um Míchumas Fisiceach agus Céadfach
There are two national disability databases in Ireland, the National Intellectual Disability Database and the National Physical and Sensory Disability Database
Tá dhá bhunachar sonraí náisiúnta um míchumas ann in Éirinn, an Bunachar Sonraí um Míchumas Intleachta agus an Bunachar Sonraí Náisiúnta um Míchumas Fisiceach agus Céadfach
Both are managed by the Health Research Board
Déanann an Bord Taighde Sláinte an dá cheann a bhainistiú

The objective of the National Physical and Sensory Disability Database is to gather information on the specialised health and personal social service needs of people with a physical, sensory or speech and language disability

Is é cuspóir an Bhunachair Shonraí Náisiúnta um Míchumas Fisiceach agus Céadfach chun faisnéis a bhailiú ar na sainriachtanais sláinte agus seirbhísí sóisialta pearsanta a bhíonn ag daoine atá faoi mhíchumas fisiceach, céadfach nó teanga agus urlabhra
The database monitors current service provision and future service requirements over a five-year period
Déanann an bunachar sonraí monatóireacht ar sholáthar seirbhísí reatha agus ar na riachtanais a bheidh ann i dtaobh seirbhísí amach anseo thar thréimhse cúig bliana
It is used for planning service developments, prioritising service needs and assisting in resource allocation decisions at national and regional level

Baintear úsáidtear as chun forbairtí seirbhísí a phleanáil, tús áite a thabhairt do riachtanais seirbhíse agus cabhrú chun cinneadh a dhéanamh maidir le hacmhainní a chur ar fáil ar leibhéal náisiúnta, réigiúnach

Information is collected from people with a physical or sensory disability who are receiving a specialised health or personal social service currently or who will require one within the next five years

Déantar eolas a bhailiú ó dhaoine faoi mhíchumas fisiceach agus/nó céadfach a bhfuil sainsheirbhísí sláinte agus seirbhísí sóisialta pearsanta dhá fháil acu nó atá ag teastáil uathu faoi láthair agus don chúig bhliain amach anseo
Eligible individuals are those who:
Tá na daoine seo a leanas i dteideal a bheith ar an mBanc Sonraí:
• Have a persistent physical or sensory disability arising from disease, disorder or trauma
• daoine faoi mhíchumas buan fisceach nó céadfach de bharr galair, easláinte nó tráma
• In the case of dual disability, have a predominant disability that is physical, sensory or speech/language
• I gcás dé-mhíchumais, go mbíonn na daoine faoi phríomh-mhíchumas atá ina mhíchumas fisiceach, céadfach nó teanga/urlabhra
• Are less than 66 years of age
• daoine atá faoi 66 bliain d'aois
• Are receiving or need a specialised health or personal social service that is related to their disability and
• daoine atá ag fáil sainsheirbhíse sláinte nó seirbhísí pearsanta sóisialta a bhaineann lena míchumas
• Have consented to being included on the database
• daoine a bhfuil a gcead tugtha acu a n-ainm a chur ar an mBanc Sonraí
The Data Protection Act 1988 and the Data Protection (Amendment) Act 2003 apply in the normal way to information on this database
Baineann an tAcht um Chosaint Sonraí 1988 agus an tAcht um Chosaint (Leasaithe) Sonraí, 2003 ar an ngnáthbhealach leis an eolas ar an mBanc Sonraí seo
This means, in summary, that you (or the parent/guardian of a child):
Ciallaíonn seo, go hachomair, go bhfuil sé de cheart agat nó más páiste thú ag do thuismitheoir/caomhnóir:
• Have a right to get a copy of the information held about you on the database. You can do this by contacting the Database Co-ordinator in your Local Health Office
• cóip den eolas atá coinnithe fút ar an mbanc sonraí a bheith agat – is féidir é seo a dhéanamh ach teagmháil a dhéanamh le Comhordnóir an Bhainc Sonraí i Fheidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte (FSS)
• Have a right to have any inaccurate information corrected or removed
• aon eolas atá míchruinn a cheartú nó a bhaint den bhanc sonraí
• Have a right to complain to the Data Protection Commissioner if your rights are not respected
• gearán a chur chuig an gCoimisinéir um Chosaint Sonraí muna bhfuil do chuid cearta dhá chosaint
If you have any questions about the database contact the Disability Office in your Local Health Office
Má bhíonn aon cheisteanna agat faoin mbunachar sonraí, déan teagmháil leis an Oifig Míchumais i d’Oifig Sláinte Áitiúil
